title: Digital Tutors - Using the Modeling Toolkit in Maya 2014
description:
Language: English
Duration: 1h 9m
Video: AVC1 1280x720 15 fps
Audio: AAC 128 Kbps 32.0 KHz
Size: 1.10 GB
Level: Intermediate
Project Files Included
Software used: Maya 2014
URL: http://www.digitaltutors.com/tutorial/1199-Using-the-Modeling-Toolkit-in-Maya-2014
Released: June 24, 2013

What you will learn:
The Modeling Toolkit is a collection of tools and functions within Maya that can help to speed up different modeling tasks.

We'll start the tutorial by learning about activating and using the toolkit and how it integrates into our existing workflow. We'll cover the different selection and transform tools it offers and use tools like Soft Selection and Vertex Locking. We'll also cover working with symmetry and using Shrinkwrap to wrap geometry around other objects.

We'll also cover each of the mesh edit tools, from Bevel to Extrude, to Connect and Bridge. In addition, we'll spend time learning about the Multi-Cut tool and how it can replace multiple existing tools in our workflow.

Finally, we'll cover custom polygon creation and retopology using Quad Draw. In the end, you'll know how the Modeling Toolkit works and be able to make an informed decision about how you can begin to integrate those tools into your existing Maya modeling workflow.
